episodesJson.title: Judas Kiss
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 2011 time travel drama Judas Kiss. When failed director Zach agrees to judge a film competition at his old alma mater, he magically travels back in time and meets himself as a student. Does he have sex with himself? You bet he does. Does anything else happen? Let's find out!
topics: Would you have sex with past you?
How many time travel references can we make? Hint: it's a lot
